entity.name: MetaRAG
entity.description: MetaRAG is an open-source Python framework for multi-model Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). It enables parallel querying of 5+ LLMs, scores responses using semantic similarity, and aggregates the top-k results for enhanced answer quality. Our mission is to build Indiaâ€™s most trustworthy AI framework for delivering contextually accurate, diverse, and explainable responses.

useOfFunds.description: Enhancing multi-LLM support, expanding document ingestion pipelines, and optimizing aggregation heuristics.
Running GPU-backed inference demos, CI/CD workflows, and uptime monitoring.
Creating tutorials, hosting webinars, and maintaining multilingual documentation to grow adoption in India and beyond.
